Question: This person died on February 28, 2009, at the age of 90 at a hospital in Phoenix, Arizona, surrounded by family and friends.
Hints: The son of a policeman, killed in 1921 this person made radio receivers as a young boy.
This person's full-length biography, Good Day! The ____ Story, was published in May 2009 by Regnery Publishing.
As guards approached, this person sprang to his feet and waved.
